tier.item: (45) Sentential adverb - Aux - VP-adverb - Participle
Mudro bjese brzo prodao kucu.
wisely be-past quickly sold house
This means that Hungarian verbal complexes, as discussed by Koopman & Szabolcsi 2000
and Kiss 2003, must either be fundamentally different from Germanic ones in not involving verb
clustering of this type (cf. Bobaljik 2003), or that Hungarian is in fact, at least with respect to the
syntax of verbal complementation, an OV language underlyingly (cf. Ackema 2003).
LF complex predicate formation 31
`It was wise of him to have sold the house quickly.'
(45) Sentential adverb - Aux - VP-adverb - Participle
Mudro bjese brzo prodao kucu.
wisely be-past quickly sold house
This means that Hungarian verbal complexes, as discussed by Koopman & Szabolcsi 2000
and Kiss 2003, must either be fundamentally different from Germanic ones in not involving verb
clustering of this type (cf. Bobaljik 2003), or that Hungarian is in fact, at least with respect to the
syntax of verbal complementation, an OV language underlyingly (cf. Ackema 2003).
LF complex predicate formation 31
`It was wise of him to have sold the house quickly.'
(45) Sentential adverb - Aux - VP-adverb - Participle
Mudro bjese brzo prodao kucu.

This means that Hungarian verbal complexes, as discussed by Koopman & Szabolcsi 2000
and Kiss 2003, must either be fundamentally different from Germanic ones in not involving verb
clustering of this type (cf. Bobaljik 2003), or that Hungarian is in fact, at least with respect to the
syntax of verbal complementation, an OV language underlyingly (cf. Ackema 2003).
LF complex predicate formation 31
It was wise of him to have sold the house quickly.
